# genesyscloud_customer_intent (Data Source)

Genesys Cloud customer intent data source. Select an customer intent by name

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "genesyscloud_customer_intent" "example_customer_intent" {
  name = "example customer intent name"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) customer intent name

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
